description.sun-moon:
The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on
the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on
the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on
the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.
description.sword-shield:
The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on
the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
effect.shortEffect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
